title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Simulation Course for Advanced Mathematical Concept Acquisition Using Metacognition

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of college-level foundational mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and understanding of basic scientific concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and explain high-dimensional mathematical concepts (multivariable calculus, basic topology) in 3D space through VR simulation.
Applying metacognitive strategies, learners can monitor their learning process and establish improvement plans based on a conceptual understanding assessment rubric.
They iteratively design and validate mathematical modeling processes with a target accuracy of 80% or higher in simulation tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
